RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: whirlwind
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: the duration of heatwave and the toxic fallout will be reduced and wind turbine output be increased.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: Refreshing breeze sweeps across your colony.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: Sunmaking
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: it immediately ends rain and eclipse, and reduces the duration of coldsnap, volcanic winter.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: The sun shines upon your colony.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: extingush the Sun
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: it causes the eclipse, ending the solar flare immediately.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: The sun is cowering from your rituals.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: ambrosia sprout
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: a small number of ambrosia will sprout, if they can.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: The earth answered your request for pleasure.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: taunt enemies
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: causes a relatively small group of enemies to attack your colony.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: Your enemies were provoked and decided to attack you.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: asteroid mining
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: causes a meteor to drop, which you can mine.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: spaceship chunk call
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: causes spaceship chunks to drop to deconstruct and gain resources.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: An orbiting piece of spaceship chunk has been brought down.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: invite trader
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: gain attention of a nearby tradership to allow your colones to trade with using the comm console.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: summon insects
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: small number of wild insects will be spawned, which can be tamed.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: Insects were intrigued and decided to surface to see what is going on.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: dust to dust
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: rotting or desiccated corpses will be destroyed.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: Ashes to ashes, dust to dust.
